name: DarkWorldz
description:
Your world is ruled by the evil and theres only one hope: that's you!
Safe your world by jumping up the plattforms and try to find the hidden exit to the next level. Collect lanterns on your way to collect coins and be lightened. Bypass critical situations and evil enemies with power-ups. Those can be bought with the coins you earn in the game.
The game is kind of a classic plattformer paired with a puzzle twist and has endless fun with allways new levels and a checkpoint feature, so you don't have always to start over from the beginning.
